title: Why Is This Happening?
description:
Kirk addresses the Texas school shooting in which 19 kids and 2 teachers lost their lives (00:00:10). Justin is now the main play by play man and possible caddy for Kirk's redemption appearance at the Maine Mini Golf tour's first major of the season (00:31:10). Credit to Brandon Tierney for cancelling on Paul O'Neill because he wouldn't discuss the Josh Donaldson controversy (00:46:00). No one is more upset than Kirk Minihane that Gerry Callahan was bumped from an appearance on Tucker Carlson (01:03:40). Springsteen is going back on tour, Alex Cooper defends Barstool & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
